scripts.bundle:all: pnpm run bundle:shop && pnpm run bundle:user && pnpm run bundle:admin
scripts.validate:all: pnpm run validate:shop && pnpm run validate:user && pnpm run validate:admin
scripts.docs:build: pnpm run bundle:all && mkdir -p docs/shop docs/user docs/admin && npx @redocly/cli build-docs bundled/shop.openapi.yaml -o docs/shop/index.html && npx @redocly/cli build-docs bundled/user.openapi.yaml -o docs/user/index.html && npx @redocly/cli build-docs bundled/admin.openapi.yaml -o docs/admin/index.html && npx @redocly/cli build-docs portal.yaml -o docs/index.html
